import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import userContext from '../Controllers/userContext' const Nav = () => { const userCon=useContext(userContext) const handleLogin=()=>{ document.getElementById('login').animate(animation,timer) setTimeout(()=>{ document.getElementById('login').style.width="100vw" document.getElementById('login').style.top="0" },280) } const animation=[ {width:"100vw"}, {width:"100vw",top:'0'} ] const timer={ iterations:1, duration:300 } return (

{ userCon.userType==="normal"? <> :(userCon.userType==="employer"? <> :<> ) }
) } export default Nav
